    • Method Detail

      • showPluginsChoiceWindow

        public static java.lang.String showPluginsChoiceWindow(java.lang.String[] plugins)
        This dialog pops up when the SystemController does not know which UIPlugin to instantiate. It lets the user decide from an array of known plugin names.
        Parameters:
        plugins - Array of plugin names.
        Returns:
        Name of the selected plugin.

      • showPluginConfigurationsChoiceWindow

        public static java.lang.String showPluginConfigurationsChoiceWindow(java.lang.String[] configs)
        This dialog pops up when the SystemController does not know which PluginConfiguration to instantiate. It lets the user decide from an array of known configuration names.
        Parameters:
        configs - Array of configuration names.
        Returns:
        Name of the selected configuration.

      • showNoPluginFound

        public static void showNoPluginFound()
        Dialog displayed when the SystemController does not find any UIPlugin.

      • showConfigurationDidNotPassSanityCheck

        public static void showConfigurationDidNotPassSanityCheck()
        Used by the SystemController to signify the user of missing UIParameters or UIProperties in the configuration.

      • showConfigurationCouldNotBeParsed
